title: Tsebišwa - Tempele ya Orbital
heading: Tsebišwa Ge E Tsoga
description:
Ka la 28 November, 2025, Tempele ya Orbital e tla rotoga.
Tlogela e-mail ya gago, gomme re tla go botša ge e fihla sebakeng.

form.successMessage: Re tla go fihlelela ge e rotoga.
form.errorMessage: Se sengwe se ile sa sepela gabotse. Hle leka gape.
